summary.span: 提供為定義 WCF 資料服務之自訂資料服務提供者所實作的一連串介面。

span.span: Provides a series of interfaces that are implemented to define a custom data service provider for WCF Data Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料服務提供者](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/data-services-providers-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Data Services Providers](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/data-services-providers-wcf-data-services.md).
